comments: Not sure if this is an author of a plant name.  He is author of an article entitled Oenothera ersteinensis, eine neue Art in Baden. in Mitt. Bad. Landesver. Naturk. Naturschutz 12. (1 - 2): 103 - 106 (1979), but this plant was described by R.Linder & R.Jean.
